name: 2D Side Scrolling Mechanics
description:
This is actually my first release. I picked up Unity again a couple months ago and just started messing around mimicking a 2D side scroller for practice.  I'm actually working on a different game that I will gladly share when I have made progress.

Move with WASD, jump with space bar(the longer you press it down the higher the jump), shoot with left mouse click
